name: NIHLINCSProgram
description: The homepage for the NIH LINCS Program

scripts.build: npm version | tee build.log || exit 1 && VERSION=$(head -1 build.log | awk '{print substr($3, 2, length($3) - 3);}') && docker build -t 146.203.54.165:5000/lincsproject:$VERSION . && rm build.log
scripts.deploy: npm version | tee build.log || exit 1 && VERSION=$(head -1 build.log | awk '{print substr($3, 2, length($3) - 3);}') && echo "$VERSION" && docker push 146.203.54.165:5000/lincsproject:$VERSION && curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X PUT -d '{ "instances": 1, "cpus": 1, "mem": 2048, "container": { "type": "DOCKER", "docker": { "image": "146.203.54.165:5000/lincsproject:'"$VERSION"'", "forcePullImage": false, "network": "BRIDGE", "portMappings": [ { "containerPort": 3001, "hostPort": 0, "protocol": "tcp" } ] }, "volumes": [ {"containerPath": "/usr/src/app/hdfs", "hostPath": "/hadoop/hdfs-mount/apps/ldr/uploads", "mode": "RW"} ] }, "healthChecks": [ { "protocol": "HTTP", "path": "/lincsproject", "gracePeriodSeconds": 10, "intervalSeconds": 60, "portIndex": 0, "timeoutSeconds": 10, "maxConsecutiveFailures": 3 }], "labels": { "public": "true" } }' maayanlab:systemsbiology@146.203.54.165:8080/v2/apps/lincsproject && rm build.log

author: Michael McDermott
